FuncDef: This command binds the specified port with the associate Interface Group Handler. Up to eightmembercommands can be issued to add multiple ports to the associated IGH. Themembermust be a port or channel on a SONET or POS MDA. It must be a physical port or channel in network mode, and not bound to any router interfaces. A port or channel cannot be a member of more than one IGH at the same time. MLPPP bundles and their members cannot be IGH members.

ParaDef.Info: Identifies the port to be associated with the interface group handler.
